channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Rubbish, food wast, 3rd July
item.description:
Every week top of floyd road rubbish, food dirty nappies all over pavement & spreading into road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 84,82,80,78,76,74,70,66,68,64,62,60,58,56,54,52,50,48,46,44,42,38A, Floyd Road, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish all over Weston court, 3rd July
item.description:
Bin men are not collecting rubbish of the floor when bins are full. We get animals coming over at night ripping all the rubbish bags and spreading litter over the whole estate. It looks FILTHY, DISGUSTING. Where are our council tax money go too?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Queens Drive, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog fouling, 3rd July
item.description:
This lady refused to pick up her dogs mess in Woolwich Road grass area, when I confronted her, and said aren’t you going to pick the mess up, said “NO” and continued to walk off as if it was her dogs personal toilet area. I said I knew where she lived which is 63 Amberley Road, I think a letter should be sent warning her if future fouling.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woolwich Road, West Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet
